label: 足利幕府
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: Ashikaga bakufu also known as the Muromachi bakufu, constituted Japans second warrior government." Closely linked to the court, this regime was formally founded by Ashikaga Takauji in 1338, and lasted until 1573."
